name: Liscuro Tomb
description:
The sacred Eye of Nahui Ollin binds shattered souls of the past to this ancient tomb. Holy Emperor Ictonauac’s soul must consolidate the light and dark spirits within it if it wishes to leave the tomb and join the olden gods.

Liscuro Tomb is a puzzle game revolving around a unique light mechanism and dual movement. Can you find the way out of the tomb?
